verses.verse: O give thanks <WH3034> unto Jehovah <WH3068>; For he is good <WH2896>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
Let the redeemed <WH1350> of Jehovah <WH3068> say <WH559> so <WH1350>, Whom he hath redeemed from the hand <WH3027> of the adversary <WH6862>,
And gathered <WH6908> out of the lands <WH776>, From the east <WH4217> and from the west <WH4628>, From the north <WH6828> and from the south <WH3220>.
They wandered <WH8582> in the wilderness <WH4057> in a desert <WH3452> way <WH1870>; They found <WH4672> no city <WH5892> of habitation <WH4186>.
Hungry <WH7457> and thirsty <WH6771>, Their soul <WH5315> fainted in them <WH5848>.
Then they cried <WH6817> unto Jehovah <WH3068> in their trouble <WH6862>, And he delivered <WH5337> them out of their distresses <WH4691>,
He led <WH1869> them also by a straight <WH3477> way <WH1870>, That they might go <WH3212> to a city <WH5892> of habitation <WH4186>.
Oh that men would praise <WH3034> Jehovah <WH3068> for his lovingkindness <WH2617>, And for his wonderful works <WH6381> to the children <WH1121> of men <WH120>!
For he satisfieth <WH7646> the longing <WH8264> soul <WH5315>, And the hungry <WH7457> soul <WH5315> he filleth <WH4390> with good <WH2896>.
Such as sat <WH3427> in darkness <WH2822> and in the shadow of death <WH6757>, Being bound <WH615> in affliction <WH6040> and iron <WH1270>,
Because they rebelled <WH4784> against the words <WH561> of God <WH410>, And contemned <WH5006> the counsel <WH6098> of the Most High <WH5945>:
Therefore he brought down <WH3665> their heart <WH3820> with labor <WH5999>; They fell down <WH3782>, and there was none to help <WH5826>.
Then they cried <WH2199> unto Jehovah <WH3068> in their trouble <WH6862>, And he saved <WH3467> them out of their distresses <WH4691>.
He brought them out <WH3318> of darkness <WH2822> and the shadow of death <WH6757>, And brake <WH5423> their bonds <WH4147> in sunder <WH5423>.
Oh that men would praise <WH3034> Jehovah <WH3068> for his lovingkindness <WH2617>, And for his wonderful works <WH6381> to the children <WH1121> of men <WH120>!
For he hath broken <WH7665> the gates <WH1817> of brass <WH5178>, And cut <WH1438> the bars <WH1280> of iron <WH1270> in sunder <WH1438>.
Fools <WH191> because <WH1870> of their transgression <WH6588>, And because of their iniquities <WH5771>, are afflicted <WH6031>.
Their soul <WH5315> abhorreth <WH8581> all manner of food <WH400>; And they draw near <WH5060> unto the gates <WH8179> of death <WH4194>.
Then they cry <WH2199> unto Jehovah <WH3068> in their trouble <WH6862>, And he saveth <WH3467> them out of their distresses <WH4691>.
He sendeth <WH7971> his word <WH1697>, and healeth <WH7495> them <WH4422>, And delivereth them from their destructions <WH7825>.
Oh that men would praise <WH3034> Jehovah <WH3068> for his lovingkindness <WH2617>, And for his wonderful works <WH6381> to the children <WH1121> of men <WH120>!
And let them offer the sacrifices <WH2077> of thanksgiving <WH8426>, And declare <WH5608> his works <WH4639> with singing <WH7440>.
They that go down <WH3381> to the sea <WH3220> in ships <WH591>, That do <WH6213> business <WH4399> in great <WH7227> waters <WH4325>;
These see <WH7200> the works <WH4639> of Jehovah <WH3068>, And his wonders <WH6381> in the deep <WH4688>.
For he commandeth <WH559>, and raiseth <WH5975> the stormy <WH5591> wind <WH7307>, Which lifteth up <WH7311> the waves thereof <WH1530>.
They mount up <WH5927> to the heavens <WH8064>, they go down <WH3381> again to the depths <WH8415>: Their soul <WH5315> melteth <WH4127> away because of trouble <WH7451>.
They reel to and fro <WH2287>, and stagger <WH5128> like a drunken man <WH7910>, And are at their wits <WH2451>' end <WH1104>.
Then they cry <WH6817> unto Jehovah <WH3068> in their trouble <WH6862>, And he bringeth them out <WH3318> of their distresses <WH4691>.
He maketh <WH6965> the storm <WH5591> a calm <WH1827>, So that the waves <WH1530> thereof are still <WH2814>.
Then are they glad <WH8055> because they are quiet <WH8367>; So he bringeth <WH5148> them unto their desired <WH2656> haven <WH4231>.
Oh that men would praise <WH3034> Jehovah <WH3068> for his lovingkindness <WH2617>, And for his wonderful works <WH6381> to the children <WH1121> of men <WH120>!
Let them exalt <WH7311> him also in the assembly <WH6951> of the people <WH5971>, And praise <WH1984> him in the seat <WH4186> of the elders <WH2205>.
He turneth <WH7760> rivers <WH5104> into a wilderness <WH4057>, And watersprings <WH4325> into a thirsty ground <WH6774>;
A fruitful <WH6529> land <WH776> into a salt <WH4420> desert <WH7451>, For the wickedness of them that dwell therein <WH3427>.
He turneth <WH7760> a wilderness <WH4057> into a pool <WH98> of water <WH4325>, And a dry <WH6723> land <WH776> into watersprings <WH4325>.
And there he maketh the hungry <WH7457> to dwell <WH3427>, That they may prepare <WH3559> a city <WH5892> of habitation <WH4186>,
And sow <WH2232> fields <WH7704>, and plant <WH5193> vineyards <WH3754>, And get <WH6213> them fruits <WH6529> of increase <WH8393>.
He blesseth <WH1288> them also <WH7235>, so that they are multiplied greatly <WH3966>; And he suffereth <WH4591> not their cattle <WH929> to decrease <WH4591>.
Again <WH4591>, they are diminished and bowed down <WH7817> Through oppression <WH6115>, trouble <WH7451>, and sorrow <WH3015>.
He poureth <WH8210> contempt <WH937> upon princes <WH5081>, And causeth them to wander <WH8582> in the waste <WH8414>, where there is no way <WH1870>.
Yet setteth he the needy <WH34> on high <WH7682> from affliction <WH6040>, And maketh <WH7760> him families <WH4940> like a flock <WH6629>.
The upright <WH3477> shall see <WH7200> it <WH8055>, and be glad; And all iniquity <WH5766> shall stop <WH7092> her mouth <WH6310>.
Whoso is wise <WH2450> will give heed <WH8104> to these things <WH995>; And they will consider the lovingkindnesses <WH2617> of Jehovah <WH3068>.
